description: Triangle of coefficients of Euler polynomials 2^n*E_n(x) (exponents in increasing order).
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 809.
links: T. D. Noe, Rows n=0..50 of triangle, flattened

Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, MathWorld: Euler Polynomial
